definition: race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: The "field work" has become a must due to ethnology's focus on the exotic culture.
sentences.chinese: 民族學對於異文化的關注使“田野工作”成爲必然。“

sentences.english: Fieldwork is the main method applied in ethnological studies.
sentences.chinese: 田野調查是民族學研究的主要方法。

sentences.english: Dr. Henderson is a famous expert on Asian ethnology.
sentences.chinese: 漢德森博士是著名的亞洲民族學專家。

sentences.english: This observation led the author to emphasize the significance of social historical perspectives in ethnological studies.
sentences.chinese: 這一認識使作者在民族學研究中注重社會歷史因素。

definition: East China University of Science and Technology
pinyin: Hua2 dong1 Li3 gong1 Da4 xue2
